__e: Girder came back to life, and he's all Young Frankenstein now, and he only recognizes Iris, and she lured him to my workshop so we could demagnetize him, but the machine shorted out, so he's about to come through that door
History will bury you, Frankenstein and no man will remember your name.
I have become the victim... of everything that Frankenstein and I ever advocated.
